channel.title: CVE Feed for Squirrly -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Squirrly -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-50854|2023-12-28T11:21:59.393Z -- squirrly -- squirrly%20seo%20-%20advanced%20pack
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Squirrly Squirrly SEO - Advanced Pack.This issue affects Squirrly SEO - Advanced Pack: from n/a through 2.3.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-29790|2024-06-04T17:56:42.003Z -- squirrly -- seo%20plugin%20by%20squirrly%20seo
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Squirrly SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO: from n/a through 12.3.16.
